Ui:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------- DPSMate MiniMap Icon -------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:RegisterForClicks("RightButtonUp") this:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") this:SetClampedToScreen(true)
this:LockHighlight() this:StartMoving()
this:UnlockHighlight() this:StopMovingOrSizing()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("DPSMate") GameTooltip:AddLine(DPSMate.localization.MiniMapLeft, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5) GameTooltip:AddLine(DPSMate.localization.MiniMapRight, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
DPSMate.Options:OpenMenu(3, this)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------- DPSMate PopUP -------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:StartMoving()
this:StopMovingOrSizing()
DPSMate_PopUp_Text:SetText(DPSMate.localization.popup) DPSMate_PopUp_AcceptText:SetText(DPSMate.localization.accept) DPSMate_PopUp_CancelText:SetText(DPSMate.localization.cancel) this:SetClampedToScreen()
DPSMate.Options:PopUpAccept()
DPSMate_PopUp:Hide()
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------- DPSMate Report -------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:StartMoving()
this:StopMovingOrSizing()
DPSMate_Report_Text:SetText(DPSMate.localization.report.." - DPSMate")
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.localization.close, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
DPSMate_Report:Hide()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.localization.channelTooltip, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
UIDropDownMenu_SetWidth(100) UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, DPSMate.Options.ChannelDropDown) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.channel)
UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, DPSMate.Options.ChannelDropDown)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.localization.SliderTooltip, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.Slider..": "..this:GetValue())
this:SetMinMaxValues(1,25) this:SetValue(6) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.Slider..": 6") getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("25")
this:SetMaxLetters(32) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.EditboxTitle)
this:ClearFocus()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.localization.EditboxTooltip, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
DPSMate.Options:Report()
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.report)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------- Templates for the config Menu -------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetTextColor(1,1,1,1)
if (not this.selected) then getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetTextColor(1,0.82,0,1) end
for i=1, 9 do getglobal("DPSMate_ConfigMenu_Menu_Button"..i).selected=false getglobal("DPSMate_ConfigMenu_Menu_Button"..i.."Texture"):Hide() getglobal("DPSMate_ConfigMenu_Menu_Button"..i.."Text"):SetTextColor(1,0.82,0,1) end this.selected=true getglobal(this:GetName().."Texture"):Show() getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetTextColor(1,1,1,1) this.func()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
this:SetMaxLetters(200)
this:ClearFocus()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
if DPSMate.DB.loaded then UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, this.func) end
if (this.aide) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
GameTooltip:Hide()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Editbox"):SetText(string.format("%.1f", this:GetValue())) if this.func and DPSMate.DB.loaded then this.func() end
this:SetMaxLetters(200) this:SetScale(0.6)
this:ClearFocus() local num = tonumber(this:GetText()) if num then this:GetParent():SetValue(num) end
this:ClearFocus() local num = tonumber(this:GetText()) if num then this:GetParent():SetValue(num) end
DPSMate.Options:OpenColorPicker(this, this.var, this.func)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) if this.aide then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:Hide()

DPSMate.Options:RemoveWindow()

if DPSMateSettings["lock"] then DPSMateSettings["lock"] = false DPSMate.Options:Unlock() else DPSMateSettings["lock"] = true DPSMate.Options:Lock() end
this.aide = DPSMate.localization.config.barfontTooltip this.func = DPSMate.Options.BarFontDropDown this.title = DPSMate.localization.config.barfont UIDropDownMenu_SetWidth(120) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(this.title)
this.aide = DPSMate.localization.config.barfontsizeTooltip this.func = function() DPSMateSettings["barfontsize"] = this:GetValue() for _, val in pairs(DPSMateSettings["windows"]) do getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_Total_Name"):SetFont(DPSMate.Options.fonts[DPSMateSettings["barfont"]], DPSMateSettings["barfontsize"], DPSMate.Options.fontflags[DPSMateSettings["barfontflag"]]) getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_Total_Value"):SetFont(DPSMate.Options.fonts[DPSMateSettings["barfont"]], DPSMateSettings["barfontsize"], DPSMate.Options.fontflags[DPSMateSettings["barfontflag"]]) for i=1, 30 do getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Name"):SetFont(DPSMate.Options.fonts[DPSMateSettings["barfont"]], DPSMateSettings["barfontsize"], DPSMate.Options.fontflags[DPSMateSettings["barfontflag"]]) getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Value"):SetFont(DPSMate.Options.fonts[DPSMateSettings["barfont"]], DPSMateSettings["barfontsize"], DPSMate.Options.fontflags[DPSMateSettings["barfontflag"]]) end end end this:SetMinMaxValues(1,32) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.config.barfontsize) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("32")
this.aide = DPSMate.localization.config.barfontflagsTooltip this.func = DPSMate.Options.BarFontFlagsDropDown this.title = DPSMate.localization.config.barfontflags UIDropDownMenu_SetWidth(120) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(this.title)

this.aide = DPSMate.localization.config.barspacingTooltip this.func = function() DPSMateSettings["barspacing"] = this:GetValue() for _, val in pairs(DPSMateSettings["windows"]) do for i=1, 30 do local bar = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i) bar:ClearAllPoints() bar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child"), "TOPLEFT") bar:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child"), "TOPRIGHT") if i>1 then bar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..(i-1)), "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, -1*DPSMateSettings["barspacing"]) else if DPSMateSettings["showtotals"] then bar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_Total"), "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, -1*DPSMateSettings["barspacing"]) else bar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_Total"), "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, -1) end end end end end this:SetMinMaxValues(1,10) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.config.barspacing) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("10")
this.aide = DPSMate.localization.config.barheightTooltip this.func = function() DPSMateSettings["barheight"] = this:GetValue() for _, val in pairs(DPSMateSettings["windows"]) do getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_Total"):SetHeight(DPSMateSettings["barheight"]) for i=1, 30 do local bar = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i) local icon = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Icon") local name = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Name") bar:SetHeight(DPSMateSettings["barheight"]) icon:SetWidth(DPSMateSettings["barheight"]) icon:SetHeight(DPSMateSettings["barheight"]) name:ClearAllPoints() name:SetPoint("LEFT", bar, "LEFT", DPSMateSettings["barheight"], 0) end end end this:SetMinMaxValues(10,25) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.config.barheight) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("10") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("25")
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Title"):SetText(DPSMate.localization.config.classicons)
if DPSMateSettings["classicons"] then DPSMateSettings["classicons"] = false for _, val in pairs(DPSMateSettings["windows"]) do for i=1, 30 do local bar = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i) bar.name = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Name") bar.icon = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Icon") bar.name:ClearAllPoints() bar.name:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", bar, "TOPLEFT") bar.name:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", bar, "BOTTOMRIGHT") bar.icon:Hide() end end else DPSMateSettings["classicons"] = true for _, val in pairs(DPSMateSettings["windows"]) do for i=1, 30 do local bar = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i) bar.name = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Name") bar.icon = getglobal("DPSMate_"..val["name"].."_ScrollFrame_Child_StatusBar"..i.."_Icon") bar.name:ClearAllPoints() bar.name:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", bar, "TOPLEFT", DPSMateSettings["barheight"], 0) bar.name:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", bar, "BOTTOMRIGHT") bar.icon:Show() end end end
